title: Rising Vine
description:
Design by Imme Huetink.

Production and finishing by First Principals.

Printed on a Cottover t-shirt (charcoal).

title: The Lighthouse
description:
The Lighthouse, designed and screen printed by First Principals in Utrecht.

The T-shirt is white, 160g, made by Cottover from FairTrade, GOTS certified cotton.
